title: ECTS conversion
content: Does anyone know how to convert credits to ECTS? I don't find pesu handbook unlike other universities. If there is an alumni who has done this please let me know

comments.body: You might get quicker responses on the PESU Study Abroad discord server

Well i found out that "4 years degree in india is considered as 3 years in Germany" so it's only 180 ECTS

Basically you can apply to courses with 4 semesters not 3 semesters

A total of 36 credit points in the fundamentals of computer science, with


12 credit points in theoretical computer science,


12 credit points in computer engineering or information technology,


12 credit points in methodological-practical computer science.


18 credit points in mathematics, with a minimum of 30 further credit points in computer science. The bachelor's thesis may not be used to make up these 30 credit points.
